items.name: Vegan Spring Rolls
items.description: Crispy rolls stuffed with cabbage, carrots, and glass noodles.

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Toasted sourdough with smashed avocado, lemon, and chili flakes.

items.name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
items.description: Quinoa, roasted veggies, hummus, and tahini dressing.

items.name: Vegan Pad Thai
items.description: Rice noodles stir-fried with tofu, peanuts, and tamarind sauce.

items.name: Vegan Chocolate Mousse
items.description: Rich mousse made with avocado, cocoa, and maple syrup.

items.name: Coconut Chia Pudding
items.description: Creamy coconut milk chia pudding topped with berries.

items.name: Green Smoothie
items.description: Kale, spinach, banana, and almond milk.

items.name: Iced Oat Milk Latte
items.description: Cold espresso with oat milk over ice.
